00029 class SearchQuery {
00030 public:
00031 
00037    SearchQuery(const SearchMap2* searchMap,
00038                const UserSearchParameters& params);
00039    
00041    int getNbrParts() const {
00042       return m_stringNumbers.size();
00043    }
00044    
00046    const char* getSearchString(int idx) const {
00047       return m_stringNumbers[idx].first.c_str();
00048    }
00049 
00051    int getHouseNumber(int idx) const {
00052       return m_stringNumbers[idx].second;
00053    }
00054    
00056    uint32 getRequestedTypes() const {
00057       return m_params.getRequestedTypes();
00058    }
00059 
00061    const UserSearchParameters& getParams() const {
00062       return m_params;
00063    }
00064 
00066    LangTypes::language_t getReqLang() const {
00067       return m_params.getRequestedLanguage();
00068    }
00069 
00074    const set<uint32>& getRegionIndeces() const {
00075       return m_regionIdx;
00076    }
00077 
00082    const set<uint32>& getCategoryIndeces() const {
00083       return m_categoryIdx;
00084    }
00085 
00090    bool searchWholeMap() const {
00091       return m_regionIdx.empty() && m_bboxes.empty() &&
00092              m_categoryIdx.empty();
00093    }
00094    
00099    bool isExactOrFull() const {
00100       return (m_params.getMatching() == SearchTypes::FullMatch) ||
00101          (m_params.getMatching() == SearchTypes::ExactMatch);
00102    }
00103 
00109    bool isOriginalRegionIdx(uint32 regIdx) const {
00110       return m_origRegions.find(regIdx) != m_origRegions.end();
00111    }
00112 
00117    bool inline coordinateInsideArea(const MC2Coordinate& coord) const;
00118 
00122    inline const UserRightsMapInfo& getRights() const {
00123       return m_params.getRights();
00124    }
00125

00127 
00129    inline void handleRadius(const SearchMap2* searchMap,
00130                             const SearchMapItem* item);
00131    
00133    inline bool stringInStringNumbers(MC2String string, int houseNbr);
00134    
00136    UserSearchParameters m_params;
00137 
00139    vector<pair<MC2String, int> > m_stringNumbers;
00140    
00142    set<uint32> m_regionIdx;
00143 
00144    // The set of categories where to find the searchables.
00145    set<uint32> m_categoryIdx;
00146

00152 };
00153 
00154 bool
00155 SearchQuery::coordinateInsideArea(const MC2Coordinate& coord) const
00156 {
00157    for( vector<MC2BoundingBox>::const_iterator it = m_bboxes.begin();
00158         it != m_bboxes.end();
00159         ++it ) {
00160       if ( it->contains(coord) ) {
00161          return true;
00162       }
00163    }
00164    return false;
00165 }
00166 
00167 bool
00168 SearchQuery::stringInStringNumbers(MC2String str, int houseNbr)
00169 {
00170    bool retVal = false;
00171 
00172    // loop the m_stringNumbers vector to see if this string is present or not
00173    pair<MC2String, int> checkPair = make_pair(str, houseNbr);
00174    int n = 0;
00175    while ( !retVal && (n < getNbrParts())) {
00176       if ( (houseNbr == getHouseNumber(n)) &&
00177            (str == getSearchString(n)) ) {
00178          retVal = true;
00179          return retVal;
00180       }
00181       n++;
00182    }
00183    
00184    return retVal;
00185 }
